Description:
Detects creation of "UserInitMprLogonScript" registry value which can be used as a persistence method by malicious actors

Author: Tom Ueltschi (@c_APT_ure)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Persistence Via Logon Scripts - Registry
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where event_type = 'createkey' and target_object like '%userinitmprlogonscript%'
